actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to accept gifts of money for the enhancement of the Capitol Building or Grounds.

summary.text: Authorizes the Architect of the Capitol to accept gifts and bequests of money, to be used for the enhancement of the Capitol Building or Grounds in a manner consistent with existing law.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to accept gifts of money for the enhancement of the Capitol Building or Grounds.
